Articles.Content: This might be intended but you can use whack a Kerbal in the VAB and SPH they can't destroy ship parts but they can destroy stuff on the launch pad
Wait. So you're saying you can shoot down rockets on the launchpad when you're in the VAB? Well I didn't know they were visible from these buildings... Or are they not?
I've never seen any vessel visible on the launch pad when in VAB. But yes, you can cause destruction using heavy whack-a-kerbal objects.
I meen that you can shoot not the rockets on the launch pad but the objects around the launch pad
